description:
Did you ever try to look into encryption by using commandline because you want something better than AES? Probably you left it after reading for 5 minutes. This gadget, however, keeps it fairly simple and lets you access all the bells and whistles one might want to use.

Don't just keep backups, encrypt your important data to your liking if you really want to keep your stuff safe!
summary: Awesome and ONLY GUI for all the encryption
Not the most beautiful logo, but software is stable and does the job

description: I use this software everyday. I think they UI could be improved somewhat, but this software has yet to fail me.
